channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The AI Slur ‘Clanker’ Has Become a Cover for Racist TikTok Skits
item.description: The online trend takes a comedic approach to spreading anti-AI messaging, but some creators are using racist references to make their point.

item.title: Navigating the next frontier at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025: Where investors see opportunity in space
item.description: On the Space Stage at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025, Celeste Ford (Stellar Ventures), Chris Morales (Point72 Ventures), and Morgan Beller (NFX) explore wher...

item.title: Covid Shots Are About to Be Widely Available Again
item.description: The CDC no longer broadly recommends the Covid-19 vaccine, but US residents will still be able to get one if they want.

item.title: Inside Intel's Hail Mary to Reclaim Chip Dominance
item.description: The struggling American chipmaker is betting that a new plant and fresh product line will help turn around its fortunes.

item.title: India pilots AI chatbot-led e-commerce with ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude in the mix
item.description: India has launched a pilot to let users shop and pay directly through AI chatbots, starting with ChatGPT.

item.title: Knapsack picks up $10M to help bridge the gap between design and engineering teams
item.description: Knapsack creates a unified workspace that integrates design and coding tools to ensure design and engineering teams are on the same page.

item.title: 6 Best Smart Locks (2025) for Front Doors, Slider Doors, and Even Garages
item.description: Upgrade your locks with fingerprint-scanning or a keypad, whether it’s at the front door or a sliding glass entryway.

item.title: Ferrari Reveals Its Electric Powerhouse, and What Could Finally Be Real EV Sound
item.description: More than 1,000 hp, 192 mph, and regen braking with more than half the force of an emergency stop aren't enough for the Italian carmaker—it might just...

item.title: Duolingo says it will ‘never’ open a San Francisco office
item.description: "For us, Pittsburgh isn’t a 'backup plan' to the Bay Area," the language learning app said.

item.title: This distributed data storage startup wants to take on Big Cloud
item.description: Tigris has raised $25 million to expand its growing network of localized data storage centers — the storage layer for decentralized computing infrastr...
